[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/17C4786-1.jpg” min_height=”350px” custom_padding=”|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ min_height=”721px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#00578c” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”25px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Equipment & Technology

The core of the Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) program is our quality products delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner. Attention to detail—all the way down to the trucks we drive—is one of the key factors in our success. Each DTI driver has his or her own assigned equipment—and these trucks are among the finest on the road. 

Drive In Style & Comfort

DTI trucks are truly one of a kind. Our late-model Volvo® conventionals are maintained in our garages by our in-house mechanics, and include:

  • Stand-up sleepers
  • Power inverters
  • Cab and bunk heaters
  • Automatic transmission
  • Cruise and engine breaks

Discover Peace of Mind

One reason DTI is known for reliability and on-time delivery is that our trucks are meticulously maintained in our own garages by our own mechanics. Got a problem with your truck? Just let your DTI mechanic know and it’ll all be taken care of.  We also keep our fleet spotlessly clean with a regular wash schedule.

Appreciating Our Veterans

If you are a veteran driver, we’ve designed DTI trucks with you in mind. We have debuted four military-themed trailers in recent years, specifically meant for veterans to drive in with pride.

excerpt.rendered: Equipment & Technology The core of the Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) program is our quality products delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner. Attention to detail—all the way down to the trucks we drive—is one of the key factors in our success. Each DTI driver has his or her own assigned equipment—and these trucks are […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Dot Transportation drivers have assigned equipment – and it is among the finest on the road:  late-model conventionals with stand-up sleepers, 430 hp. engines, autoshift transmission, cruise, and engine brakes.

One reason DTI is known for reliability and on-time delivery is that our trucks are meticulously maintained in our own garages by our own mechanics. Got a problem with your truck?  Just let your DTI mechanic know and it will be fixed.  We also keep our fleet spotlessly clean with a regular wash schedule.

The core of the DTI program is quality products delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner. Attention to detail—all the way down to the vehicles we drive—is one of the key factors in our success.
